data.title: Death in Paradise Christmas special cast - meet the characters
data.meta_description: BBC One's Death in Paradise returns for a Christmas special on Boxing Day 2023, but which guest stars will be joining Neville on the island?
data.text:
Here's everything you need to know about the Death in Paradise Christmas special cast.

Death in Paradise Christmas special main cast

Ralf Little as DI Neville Parker

Don Warrington as Commissioner Selwyn Patterson

Shantol Jackson as DS Naomi Thomas

Tahj Miles as Officer Marlon Pryce

Élizabeth Bourgine as Mayor Catherine Bordey

Ginny Holder as Darlene Curtis

Death in Paradise Christmas special guest cast

Geoff Bell as Gerry Stableforth

Patsy Kensit as Bella Stableforth

Amelia Clarkson as Mariana Stableforth

Freddy Carter as Benjamin Stableforth

Bronagh Waugh as Debbie Clumson

Youssef Kerkour as Dave Chadwick

Leila Khan as Riley Biggs

Doon Mackichan as Melanie Parker

For more information about the characters and where you've seen the cast before, read on...

Ralf Little plays DI Neville Parker

Who is DI Neville Parker? Neville Parker is Saint Marie's resident detective inspector, following on from Richard Poole (Ben Miller), Humphrey Goodman (Kris Marshall) and Jack Mooney (Ardal O'Hanlon). Last season, his confidence was knocked substantially when he was tricked by former love interest Sophie Chambers, so much so that he was considering leaving the island. But he's staying put, for the time being at least.

More like this

What else has Ralf Little been in? Ralf Little's CV includes plenty of screen favourites, including 24 Hour Party People, Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps and The Royle Family.

Don Warrington plays Commissioner Selwyn Patterson

Who is Commissioner Selwyn Patterson? Selwyn Patterson, who has been an integral part of Death in Paradise from day one, oversees the running of the island's police department with his cool, calm and collected approach – although Neville has a habit of ruffling his feathers.

What else has Don Warrington been in? Don Warrington is an MBE who has appeared in countless productions, both on the stage and the screen. One of his most prominent roles is that of Philip in Rising Damp, and he also appeared in Doctor Who's Rise of the Cybermen back in 2006. In 2008, he took part in Strictly Come Dancing, in which he was partnered with Lilia Kopylova. Warrington left the competition in week five.

Shantol Jackson plays DS Naomi Thomas

Who is Naomi Thomas? Naomi arrived in season 11 to replace DS Florence Cassell. She stepped up from an officer to Detective Sergeant and has breezed her way ever since.

What else has Shantol Jackson been in? Helmed as one of Jamaica's rising actors, Jackson has featured in a variety of stage, film and TV projects both in Jamaica and internationally. She has starred in Idris Elba's Yardie, Sprinter and Sugar.

Tahj Miles plays Officer Marlon Pryce

Who is Marlon Pryce? Marlon Pryce's Death in Paradise journey has been an eventful one. When he first arrived in season 10, he was a petty criminal who spent his days scamming tourists, but he's now turned his life around and is a valued member of the local force. Last season, he set his sights on a promotion, but wasn't ready to take that next step.

What else has Tahj Miles been in? The most notable title on Tahj Miles's CV is Mangrove, the first film in Steve McQueen's anthology series Small Axe, which centres on London's West Indian community during the 1960s, '70s and '80s.

Élizabeth Bourgine plays Mayor Catherine Bordey

Who is Catherine Bordey? Catherine Bordey is the island's mayor and she also owns her own beachfront bar. She is always on hand to pour a drink and offer her punters some first-rate advice.

What else has Élizabeth Bourgine been in? Bourgiune is French and has appeared in several shows and movies native to her home country, such as Private Lessons (Cours privé), A Heart in Winter (Un cœur en hiver), and My Best Friend (Mon meilleur ami).

Ginny Holder plays Darlene Curtis

Who is Darlene Curtis? Darlene first appeared in season 7 as a love interest for fan-favourite officer Dwayne Myers (Danny John-Jules). It was later hinted that a romance could possibly develop between Darlene and Selwyn. She then became a police recruit in season 11 and has since become an invaluable member of the team

What else has Ginny Holder been in? Holder is best known for her role in Holby City, but has also appeared in BBC thriller The Capture.

Guest stars

Geoff Bell plays Gerry Stableforth

Who is Gerry Stableforth? An entrepreneur who is found dead in a ravine.

Where have I seen Geoff Bell before? His CV includes RocknRolla, Channel 4 comedy The Curse, Prime Video thriller Absentia, Girl with a Pearl Earring and more.

Patsy Kensit plays Bella Stableforth

Who is Bella Stableforth? Gerry's glamorous wife. They love one another but can also clash on occasion.

Where have I seen Patsy Kensit before? On the small screen, she's best known for Emmerdale, EastEnders and Holby City. She's also appeared in a number of films including Lethal Weapon 2, Twenty-One, Hanover Street and Absolute Beginners, among others.

Amelia Clarkson plays Mariana Stableforth

Who is Amelia? Bella and Gerry's daughter. She's not long out of art college and is being bankrolled by her father.

Where have I seen Amelia Clarkson before? You might have watched her in historical drama The Last Kingdom, BBC horror drama Red Rose or period drama Poldark.

Freddy Carter plays Benjamin Stableforth

Who is Benjamin Stableforth? Bella and Gerry's son, who is also involved in his father's business.

Where have I seen Freddy Carter before? He's best known for Netflix's Shadow and Bone.

Bronagh Waugh plays Debbie Clumson

Who is Debbie Clumson? A digital marketing guru working for Gerry. After she finds his body, she vanishes.

Where have I seen Bronagh Waugh before? She's appeared in Ripley starring Adrian Dunbar, Hollyoaks, Des starring David Tennant, crime drama Viewpoint and Unforgotten season 3, among others.

Youssef Kerkour plays Dave

Who is Dave? Debbie's fiancé. Initially, he stays in the UK while she travels to the Caribbean, but when news of her disappearance reaches home, he heads out there to investigate.

Where have I seen Youssef Kerkour before? You might know him from Netflix's Stay Close and Channel 4 comedy Home.

Leila Khan plays Riley

Who is Riley? Gerry's confidant, loquacious niece.

Where have I seen Leila Khan before? She's best know for playing Sahar in Netflix's Heartstopper.

Doon Mackichan plays Melanie

Who is Melanie? Neville's "larger-than-life" mum who is visiting her son for Christmas. Melanie does her best to cheer him up after last season's heartbreak.

Where have I seen Doon Mackichan before? She's best known for comedies Two Doors Down, Smack the Pony, Plebs and Toast of London, among others.

Death in Paradise's 2023 Christmas special will air on Boxing Day at 9pm on BBC One and iPlayer. Check out more of our Drama coverage or visit our TV Guide and Streaming Guide to find out what's on.
